title: who can a person contact for hiway repairs?the bridge at jackeys creek on hiway 133 in brunswick county has been paved in strips  and it\'s like going over bumps they use to slow down cars in neighborhoods.it\'s rough when you hit it at about 45 mph.it\'s very bad on a motorcycle and probably messes up alignment on cars also.
